ComicInfo.Penciller: Vince Mielcarek,Matt Wagner,Ron Harris,Abel Laxamana,Matt Wagner,Ron Harris,Abel Laxamana,Vince Mielcarek
ComicInfo.Summary: Games official Banjani tells Bulleyes aerlialist Starlin Munro that his team is slapping an inertia injunction on him. Later he meets with his lawyer in her opulent living quarters and listens to her lecture on how the cultivation of the miracle plant hemp has changed the culture. That night he visits and spends the night with his friend Trae, who is miffed he's two hours late.
ComicInfo.Title: The Aerialist Chapter 2; Crash Ryan [Part II]; Pilgrim Souls
ComicInfo.Writer: Jim Spivey,Matt Wagner,Ron Harris,Matt Wagner,Ron Harris,Jim Spivey
